SqlOutput.Sql: NVL2(TRUNC(ABS((CAST(-DATEDIFF(MILLISECOND,CAST(PARSEDATETIME($!s0s!$.timeString1__c,'HH:mm:ss[.SSS]','en','UTC') as TIME(3)),CAST(PARSEDATETIME($!s0s!$.timeString2__c,'HH:mm:ss[.SSS]','en','UTC') as TIME(3))) AS DECIMAL(38,10))/1000))),TO_CHAR(TRUNC((TRUNC(ABS((CAST(-DATEDIFF(MILLISECOND,CAST(PARSEDATETIME($!s0s!$.timeString1__c,'HH:mm:ss[.SSS]','en','UTC') as TIME(3)),CAST(PARSEDATETIME($!s0s!$.timeString2__c,'HH:mm:ss[.SSS]','en','UTC') as TIME(3))) AS DECIMAL(38,10))/1000))))/3600),'FM99999909')||':'||TO_CHAR(MOD(TRUNC((TRUNC(ABS((CAST(-DATEDIFF(MILLISECOND,CAST(PARSEDATETIME($!s0s!$.timeString1__c,'HH:mm:ss[.SSS]','en','UTC') as TIME(3)),CAST(PARSEDATETIME($!s0s!$.timeString2__c,'HH:mm:ss[.SSS]','en','UTC') as TIME(3))) AS DECIMAL(38,10))/1000))))/60),60),'FM09')||':'||TO_CHAR(MOD(TRUNC(TRUNC(ABS((CAST(-DATEDIFF(MILLISECOND,CAST(PARSEDATETIME($!s0s!$.timeString1__c,'HH:mm:ss[.SSS]','en','UTC') as TIME(3)),CAST(PARSEDATETIME($!s0s!$.timeString2__c,'HH:mm:ss[.SSS]','en','UTC') as TIME(3))) AS DECIMAL(38,10))/1000)))),60),'FM09'),NULL)
